initiatives.title: Osiligi Pad Project
initiatives.description: Providing reusable menstrual pads and sewing training to empower local communities.

initiatives.title: Osiligi Pad Project
initiatives.description: Currently, we are working on an exciting initiative in partnership with MWEGO, a women's empowerment group in Maasai Mara, to produce reusable, eco-friendly menstrual pads in the United States and then distribute the pads to adolescent girls in Kenya.
highlights: Plans for follow-up training in June

initiatives.title: Western Kenya Distribution
initiatives.description: A Sisterherd Strong board member has distributed menstrual pads in western Kenya, expanding our reach to support more communities.

initiatives.title: Nairobi Outreach
initiatives.description: Working with colleagues to establish distribution networks in two locations across Nairobi, with plans for follow-up evaluations and expansion.
